ValidationRule.description: Requires Custodial Account Number Received Date field if Census & Eligibility Date field is complete
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
((ISBLANK( Matrix_07C_Account__c ) = TRUE) && ISPICKVAL(Custodian__c, "MG Trust Company, LLC.") && (ISBLANK( Custodial_Account_Number_Received__c ) = FALSE))
||
((ISBLANK( Custodian_Account_ID__c ) = TRUE) && (ISBLANK( Custodial_Account_Number_Received__c ) = FALSE))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Enter the Matrix 07C Number and/or the Custodian Account ID to move forward.
